subject: Soccer
lead_paragraph: Barcelona wasn't allowed to be at its fluent best at home, but it still came from a goal down to win, 2-1, in front of 94,990 at the Camp Nou.
snippet: Barcelona wasn't allowed to be at its fluent best at home, but it still came from a goal down to win, 2-1, in front of 94,990 at the Camp Nou.
